abstract: The extended deal, along with an agreement by ABC to continue the broadcast in the United States through 2020, secures a lucrative arrangement for the academy.

lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES—The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences shored up the future of the Oscars with another long-term agreement: This one, announced by the Academy on Friday, extends through 2020 a deal under which Walt Disney’s media unit distributes the Academy Awards telecast abroad.

headline.main: Disney Media Unit to Distribute Oscar Telecast Abroad Through 2020
